EasyMocap
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which EasyMocap installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using EasyMocap, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load EasyMocap/0.2-foss-2022a-CUDA-11.7.0
```
